share_url_dialog.title: Share URL
share_url_dialog.description: Share this URL with others via copy or social media

landing_home.description: Transform long, clunky URLs into compact, shareable links in seconds

footer.slogan: Crafting high-performance full-stack websites that drive real business results.

landing_faq.title: Frequently asked questions
landing_faq.description: We've compiled the most important information to help you get the most out of your experience. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us.

item_1.question: Is the service secure?
item_1.answer: While we don't scan for malware, all links are generated without storing sensitive user data. Please use the service responsibly.

item_2.question: How fast are links created?
item_2.answer: Links are generated instantly. Note that you'll need an account to use the service.

item_3.question: Do links expire?
item_3.answer: Yes. In this test deployment, links expire after 5 minutes to prevent storing sensitive data and maintain a clean, optimized testing environment for all users.

item_4.question: What data is collected when a link is accessed?
item_4.answer: For each visit, we collect the IP address and user agent. From this information, we determine the browser, device type, and approximate location (including country, region, city, and coordinates). During testing, for legal and security reasons, all requests are recorded with the server's IP address instead of the user's actual IP. This data is associated with the specific shortened URL and includes the access timestamp.

item_5.question: Is the service really free?
item_5.answer: Yes. The service is completely free—there are no subscriptions or hidden charges.

item_6.question: How long does an account last?

answer.description: These rules apply only to this test website's trial mode. Accounts expire under these conditions:
conditions: Inactive accounts (with no URLs or clicks) expire after 10 minutes
Active accounts without clicks expire after 15 minutes
Accounts with active clicks remain active until 5 minutes pass without new clicks (but never exceed the 15-minute maximum for active accounts)

error_messages.regex: First name must be capitalized and contain no space
error_messages.min: First name must have at least two letters

error_messages.regex: Last name must be capitalized and contain no space
error_messages.min: Last name must have at least two letters
Password must be at least 8 char long
error_messages.symbols: Password must contain at least one of the following symbols: !@#$%^&*()
